heads up or just shut it blackjack31

@blakjack31: That's not what the last page states. The first sentence states "Doumo, Hosuteiru desu," which is "Nice to see you, it's Horsetail." It goes on to state "This will be the fourth installment of the series/work, 'Mother, it has to be you' [or 'It has to be mother.']" I then went on to translate the end, and it states, "Although, I feel this each time, there are parts I felt I could've done better. I want to learn more and put that towards my next work. Thank you for your continued support. See you next time. Horsetail." Don't rely too much on Google Translate. It only gives a general sense of what's being said. And if you don't know where to punctuate, then your sentences will get messy and make little sense. Take your time with it, because like English, the words can have multiple meanings. Just a heads up.

@potency: By definition, this series is NTR, but you may be right as far as it concerns the series' tone. According to the series author, he doesn't believe there to be anything "NTR" about this series when pressed by a fan. (He's a self proclaimed lover of mother-son incest.) And if you look at the four parts as well as the omakes he draws, the series is light-hearted. What people have done is conflate rape, blackmail, plot twists, and mind-breaks with NTR to a point where it's almost pointless to make a distinction. Nevertheless, the "NTR" some are hoping for is doubtful to happen since most of the work done on this series (over 250 pages) involves just the mother and son.

need english translate

@DavisGod: They're asking for NTR because many of them do not enjoy a straight-laced story. They're more about seeing the female dominated and losing control. Technically this is NTR because the father, albeit a secondary character, is being cuckolded by his wife and son. And this series has put effort into showing that (i.e. having sex while the mother's on the phone with her husband/his father, having sex while the father stands outside the door, mother gives son a blowjob while the father waits downstairs, having sex in the same bedroom while the father sleeps on the other bed, having sex in the shower while the father uses the bathroom.) 

I doubt this story will take the route giwa99 is suggesting. Rarely does it happen that the plot changes this far into the series (189 pages in, not to mention all the bonus drawings he has made.) With that said however, Horsetail is a new mangaka, and this series is quite episodic, so who knows where it can go. But this series has a light tone.
